# criblio_source (Data Source)

Source DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "criblio_source" "my_source" {
  group_id = "default"
  id       = "input-hec-1"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `group_id` (String) The consumer group to which this instance belongs. Defaults to 'default'.
- `id` (String) Unique ID to GET

### Read-Only

- `items` (List of Map of String)
